attributes.comment:
I am in the process of adopting a child from China. Adoption is a lenghty and
unpredictable process. I have already applied and paid the fees outlined in
this petition. It has become evident that my travel to China will come later
than the expiration dates of all the applications. I will need to reapply and
pay once again all the fees in this petition. Only this time they will be a
drastic 66% more. Adoption is an expensive process already and this petition
unreasonably raises the cost. I am only one of thousands of adoptive parents
that will be hurt by this petition. I strongly object to this petition and find
it completely unfair.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Deborah Bassino
